params.creators: Array of creator addresses to score

params._deadline: Unix timestamp after which submissions and votes close
params._description: Detailed description of what creators should produce

returns.totalScores: Array of weighted final scores (0 until finalized)

params.contentURI: IPFS hash or URL pointing to the creator's submission

_bountyVoters.details: bountyId => list of all voter addresses (for winner-stake computation)

allBountyIds.details: Track all bounty IDs for enumeration

bountyCreators.details: bountyId => ordered list of creator addresses

hasJoined.details: bountyId => creator address => true if already joined

totalStakedPerBounty.details: bountyId => total MON staked by all voters

winnerTotalStake.details: bountyId => total stake placed on the winning creator

claimCreatorReward(uint256).notice: Winner claims 70% of the reward pool.

claimVoterReward(uint256).notice: Voters claim their stake back. If they voted for the winner, they also         receive a proportional share of 20% of the reward pool.

companyJudge(uint256,address[],uint256[].notice: Company scores each creator 0-100. Can only be called once per bounty.

createBounty(string,string,uint256).notice: Create a new bounty. The sent MON becomes the reward pool.

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdrawal for unclaimed funds after a long period.         Only callable by the platform owner.

finalizeBounty(uint256).notice: Finalize the bounty: compute final scores, determine winner, pay platform fee.         Anyone can call after deadline + company has judged.

getActiveBounties().notice: Get all active (not finalized, deadline not passed) bounty IDs.

getBounty(uint256).notice: Get full details of a specific bounty.

getBountyCreators(uint256).notice: Get the list of creator addresses for a bounty.

getLeaderboard(uint256).notice: Get the full leaderboard for a bounty.

getVoteInfo(address,uint256).notice: Get a voter's stake info for a specific bounty.

joinBounty(uint256,string).notice: Join a bounty by submitting content.

vote(uint256,address,bool).notice: Vote on a creator's submission by staking MON.         Each wallet gets exactly one vote per bounty (up or down on one creator).

userdoc.notice: A Social-Fi bounty platform for Monad where companies post bounties,         creators submit content, and the community votes with staked MON.         Scoring: 60% company judge + 40% community votes.         Reward split: 70% winner, 20% winning voters, 10% platform.
